name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Shadowsteel Sword
description: A deadly sword forged from a rare combination of shadow essence and steel.
looks: The Shadowsteel Sword has a sleek and elegant design, with a silver steel blade and a black handle made from shadow-infused metal. It glimmers with a faint purple aura.

special_effects.shadow_strike: Has a chance to apply a debuff that reduces enemy's resistance to dark damage.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: Heavy steel armor that provides excellent protection for the wearer.
looks: The steel plate armor is made up of interlocking steel plates, covering the entire body. It has reinforced sections on the chest and legs, as well as shoulder and elbow guards.

name: Amulet of Strength
description: An amulet that grants enhanced physical strength to the wearer.
looks: The amulet is made of a polished silver chain with a pendant in the shape of a clenched fist. The fist is made of solid gold and has intricate details.

name: Fire Staff
description: A staff imbued with the power of fire, capable of casting destructive fire spells.
looks: The Fire Staff is a long wooden staff with a burning flame at the top. The staff itself is intricately carved with fire motifs, and the flames flicker and dance.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Allows the use of fire spells with increased power and effectiveness.

name: Fiery Sword
description: A sword engulfed in flames. It is said to have been forged in the fiery depths of a volcano.
looks: The Fiery Sword has a blade made of gleaming steel, with fiery patterns etched into the metal. The hilt is adorned with a fiery red gemstone.

special_effects.ignition: Has a chance to ignite enemies on hit.

name: Broadsword
description: A heavy and powerful sword with a wide blade, capable of inflicting devastating damage on enemies.
looks: The broadsword has a long and wide blade, with a double-edged design. The hilt is made of sturdy wood wrapped in leather, providing a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Improves damage and accuracy when using swords.

name: Diamond Sword
description: A sword made from a rare and precious diamond
looks: The Diamond Sword is a sparkling blade with a translucent blue hue. It has an intricately designed hilt with diamond accents.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.
